list.name: Default
list.comment: Began to integrate django-avatar (use /avatar/render_primary/username/size_px to get the av

task.summary: Added reply count to PostSerializer, added TagSerializer and tag list, etc.
Upgraded to use generic views rather than function-based views.
Added post support to topiclist. Differentiated serializers.
Added user serializer, view. Added reverse field to user model containing their posts.
Began to add django-guardian object permissions to posts.
Pagination added (via ?limit=n&offset=n) and renamed author_id to author (since internally it used to get stored as author_id_id, which was weird and confusing)
Added token auth with djoser, and registration. Email verification available, but *untested*
Added email verification requirement before adding to 'registered' group.
Added tags via foreign key manytomany rather than comma separated list.
Added author name to post and topic serializers to avoid clients having to thrash API to get user names.
Inadvertently broke TopicSerializer instead of fixing PostSerializer.
Slightly optimised topic serializer for speed.
Post model now uses foreign key for replies rather than just having a strange one-way relationship.
Added gravatar avatar view at /api/v0.1/avatar/userid/. Could be potential security issue for some people since Gravatar hashes aren't totally secure, but local avatar storage will be added later.

MESSAGE.value: Added reply count to PostSerializer, added TagSerializer and tag list, etc.
Upgraded to use generic views rather than function-based views.
Added post support to topiclist. Differentiated serializers.
Added user serializer, view. Added reverse field to user model containing their posts.
Began to add django-guardian object permissions to posts.
Pagination added (via ?limit=n&offset=n) and renamed author_id to author (since internally it used to get stored as author_id_id, which was weird and confusing)
Added token auth with djoser, and registration. Email verification available, but *untested*
Added email verification requirement before adding to 'registered' group.
Added tags via foreign key manytomany rather than comma separated list.
Added author name to post and topic serializers to avoid clients having to thrash API to get user names.
Inadvertently broke TopicSerializer instead of fixing PostSerializer.
Slightly optimised topic serializer for speed.
Post model now uses foreign key for replies rather than just having a strange one-way relationship.
Added gravatar avatar view at /api/v0.1/avatar/userid/. Could be potential security issue for some people since Gravatar hashes aren't totally secure, but local avatar storage will be added later.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Added gravatar avatar view at /api/v0.1/avatar/userid/. Could be potential security issue for some people since Gravatar hashes aren't totally secure, but local avatar storage will be added later.
